valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Sat 31 Jan 2026 to 12:00 (UTC) on Sun 1 Feb 2026
general_synopsis: New low expected Plymouth 998 by 0600 tomorrow. Low Irish Sea 985 losing its identity

In northeast, occasional snow. In southwest, occasional rain.

In northeast, moderate or poor. In southwest, moderate or good.
